resources.string: Image of James From Team Rocket
Me and my pokemon come to your house and destroy you. What terms of batte shall herald your crushing defeat? We offer all the classics! Except the bad ones.
NO Smogon rulesets, sleep/freeze/evasion/OHKO clauses. No baton pass, swagger, SleepTrap or other individual or team move restrictions. No ability or item restrictions. We don\'t do that here.
